current.shop_blind_sub_title: Just a price and a promise
current.shop_blind_desc: Welcome to the July 26th - August 31st Shop Blind Challenge! It's simple. Would you buy something that you can't see? We promise you'll get something you'll love. If you don't think it's perfect, you can return it, no questions asked. Trust us! 100% of the profits are donated to Foundation Fighting Blindness to help find a cure for blindness. After August 31st, all of these items disappear!
current.shopblind_cart: All of our Shop Blind items make great gifts, so don't  forget to shop for your special someone
current.shopblind_video_subheader: Hear brothers Brad and Bryan Manning tell the story behind their charitable brand
current.accessibility_discliamer: Two Blind Brothers strives to ensure that its site is fully accessible to people with disabilities. Despite our best efforts, some content may not have yet been fully adapted to the strictest accessibility standards. This may be a result of not having found or identified the most appropriate technological solution. If you wish to report an accessibility issue, have any questions or need assistance, please contact Support at hello@twoblindbrothers.com
current.popup_text: There are three reasons why this is a big deal:
current.popup_reason_text_1: The clothing collection you are about to see is literally unlike any other. Touch the fabric and you‚Äôll know it for yourself.
current.popup_reason_text_2: You‚Äôve been invited to this experience because you care about our mission and are truly more than just a customer.
current.popup_reason_text_3: All profit is donated to help us to fund a cure. With your help, we have raised over $1.5m+ to fighting blindness.

settings.text: At a young age, Bradford and Bryan Manning were both diagnosed with an eye disease that causes blindness over time. This condition has inspired a special vigilance for details, a passion that carries over into the construction of their clothing line. They are both graduates of the University of Virginia and currently live in NYC.

Bradford and Bryan get down to the details. At launch, they spent six months sitting in coffee shops and going back and forth on how to source the best fabrics, the perfect factory partners and even the right buttons. Their diligence is evident in the well-considered clothing collections now available to all.

settings.title: Why We Do What We Do

settings.text: There are a lot of people out there like Bradford and Bryan. We want to lift them up. That's why we have factory workers on the blindness spectrum produce our clothes in Dallas. If there is one thing to know about Two Blind Brothers, it is that anyone can make a difference.

settings.title: Feel the Difference
settings.subtitle: Trust us, we're blind. It's the softest shirt you'll ever feel.

settings.text: Our signature touch comes down to natural textures and tested materials. For example, our tri-blend of premium bamboo (66%), cotton (28%) and spandex (6%).¬†
settings.subtext: THIS IS THE STUFF BEHIND WHAT WE CALL THE WOW EFFECT.

settings.heading: HEY BRYAN, HOW SOFT ARE THEY?
HEY BRYAN, HOW SOFT ARE THEY?

settings.shipping_q: How do I change my shipping address?
settings.shipping_a: If you accidentally put in the wrong address for your order, please email us at hello@twoblindbrothers.com or contact customer service as soon as possible so we can get the order updated. Please include your order number, the old address, and the new address when contacting us to making changes to your shipping address.

Shipping varies by the location it is being shipped to. Orders must be placed before 3pm for it to ship out the same day. Orders do not ship out on National Holidays or on weekends. If your order is shipped domestically it should arrive within 5 to 7 business days. If your order is international, please allow for 7 to 10 business days.

Orders may take longer to be processed and shipped near the holidays and on sale days.

All shipping options can be viewed at checkout.

Two Blind Brothers will ship everywhere. We charge a $30 shipping fee for international orders. If your order is international, it will be shipped via USPS. Two Blind Brothers has no control over duties and taxes and cannot waive these charges. Additionally, we cannot control how long your product takes to go through customs.
A tracking number will be Included in the shipping confirmation email. You may go to UPS.com or USPS.com and use the tracking number to track your package.

settings.shipping_q: What if the item I want is sold out or on pre-order?
settings.shipping_a: If an item you want is sold out or on pre-order, we will notify you as soon as the item is in stock. Please allow up to 3 days from receiving an “in stock” email for the item to ship.

settings.returns_q: How do I return a purchase?
settings.returns_a:
We offer free returns and exchanges. You can return your online order by requesting a return label via this link or by emailing us at: hello@twoblindbrothers.com The order can only be returned for full refund within 30 days of purchase. Orders can be exchanged within 30 days of purchase if it has not been worn and is in good condition.

- Start your return process and print your label here
- Remember to include the customer order number and billing name in the request.
- A return label will be emailed to you. Shipping will be paid for.
- Drop your return package at an authorized location. You can find your nearest location at ups.com or usps.com.
- If your order is a return, you will be refunded after the returned item has been received by us.
- If your order is an exchange, your exchange will be sent out once the exchanged item has been received by us.

- Please include in the notes the item you are returning as well as the item you would like to receive in exchange (if it is an exchange).

settings.returns_q: How do I return an order shipped internationally?
settings.returns_a: At this time, we are unable to pay for the return shipping for orders that were shipped internationally. If you need to return an international order, please follow the above instructions but keep in mind that you will have to pay for shipping.

Sale merchandise is included in our 30-day return and exchange policy with the exception of Final Sale merchandise as marked on your order confirmation. Final Sale merchandise may not be returned or exchanged.

settings.returns_q: Are shipping and handling charges refundable?
settings.returns_a: No. Shipping and handling charges are non-refundable.

settings.returns_q: How do I return a gift?
settings.returns_a: If you have received an item as a gift, you can return it in exchange for credit online at its current price, unless it is final sale.  Please contact us at hello@twoblindbrothers.com if there are any issues. We may ask for additional details to identify the manner in which the item was purchased.

settings.returns_q: What do I do if the product I received is damaged?
settings.returns_a: If the product was damaged or shipped incorrectly, please contact us at hello@twoblindbrothers.com. We will gladly exchange or return a damaged or incorrect order.

settings.returns_q: How do I obtain another copy of my order invoice and/or return label?
settings.returns_a:
Whenever you complete a purchase online you are sent a confirmation email so you can simply search your email inbox for the copy of this receipt -- this will include your order number, itemized order breakdown, and tracking information. Also, when you generate your return label from our website it is sent to you via email so you can search your inbox for the copy of that as well.  If you have any issues, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at hello@twoblindbrothers.com, and we will help you get all the info you need! 

For your return label please click here, and for further information about returns and exchanges, please see the specific returns and exchanges page.

settings.orders_a: Orders will be fully or partially fulfilled 1-2 business days after the order is placed. If the item is out of stock, you will be notified through email about the expected timeline.

settings.orders_q: How will I know when my order has shipped?
settings.orders_a: You will receive a confirmation email with the tracking code for your order.

settings.orders_q: Can I modify or cancel my order?
settings.orders_a:
Please contact us at at hello@twoblindbrothers.com or call us at (917) 722-6284 to make modifications to your order or to cancel it. Once your order has been placed, there is no way to change the order without contacting our customer service representatives. If there are small changes to your order, such as sizing, please contact customer service.

If you are would like to add items to your order, please place a separate and new order.

settings.orders_q: How is sales tax taken into account?
settings.orders_a: We only collect sales tax for orders that are delivered to addresses in New York, and Texas since we have a physical location in New York and a fulfillment center in Texas. Sales tax is automatically applied, as per state, city, and county tax code.  We evaluate any changes to the tax code every 30 days so you can rest easy that you are being taxed accurately.  If the items are being shipped outside of New York or Texas, you will not be charged sales tax.

settings.about_q: Who are the Two Blind Brothers?
settings.about_a: Founders and brothers Bryan Manning and Bradford Manning are the Two Blind Brothers. They grew up in Virginia and currently live together in New York City. They are equally obsessed about the way clothing feels, and they are ruthlessly committed to finding cures for blindness. At a young age they were both diagnosed with Stargardt disease, which is a form of macular degeneration.

settings.about_q: How much vision do the brothers have?
settings.about_a: Their current visual acuity is approximately 20/400. They are both legally blind. Stargardt disease generally affects the center vision while the peripheral vision remains unaffected. The retention of their peripheral vision allows the brothers to get around without visual assistance in most circumstances (for example, they don’t use a white cane or have a guide dog). Their greatest visual challenges include reading small text and recognizing faces.

settings.about_q: Is Two Blind Brothers a company or charity?
settings.about_a: We like to think we are both – a social enterprise and a charity project. Legally, however, we are set up as an LLC, but we may change our corporate structure down the road. We donate 100% of profits to charitable foundations, programs, and researchers focused on our mission.

The profits go towards research programs that are developing therapies for retinal eye disease cures. We select the beneficiaries through our own network and other trusted organizations. Bradford Manning is a director on the board of the Foundation Fighting Blindness, an organization we work very closely with.

settings.about_q: What if I just want to donate?
settings.about_a: At this moment we do not accept direct donations, so we encourage you to donate directly to the Foundation Fighting Blindness.

settings.payments_q: What forms of payment do you accept online?
settings.payments_a: We accept the following forms of payment: American Express, MasterCard, Visa, and Discover Network.

settings.payments_q: Can I get a refund in a different payment method than used on my original order?
settings.payments_a: No, all refunds will be issued in the original form of payment.

settings.payments_q: Can I obtain a price adjustment for an online purchase?
settings.payments_a:
We will issue a price adjustment if the item drops in price within 14 days of purchase.

1. Adjustments will not be given on sale merchandise or promotional purchases.

2. Refunds and price adjustments will be issued in the original form of payment.

3. Please email us at hello@twoblindbrothers.com for the adjustment.

settings.payments_q: Will you match the price of an item that I see marked down elsewhere?
settings.payments_a:
We will match the price of items seen elsewhere at a lesser price as long as the product is Two Blind Brothers.

1. Documentation must be provided showing the product with the listed lower price.

2. A price match must occur at the time an order is placed.

3. Please email us at hello@twoblindbrothers.com or call us at (917) 722-6284 and we’ll adjust the current selling price to match the documented selling price.

4. If you already bought the item and see it elsewhere at a cheaper price, documentation must be provided, and a refund will be applied to your account.

settings.payments_q: How do I use a promo code online?
settings.payments_a: To redeem a special offer, enter your promo code during checkout. After entering the offer code, the price will be adjusted accordingly. Special offers are valid while supplies last. Please see the specific offer details for complete terms and conditions, including expiration date and other exceptions. Only one promo code can be used on a purchase.

settings.payments_q: Can I return an item I purchased with a promotion code?
settings.payments_a: Yes, you can return an item purchased with a promotion code, as long as the item was not Final Sale. You can also exchange the item for an item of equal or lesser value. A previously used promotion code cannot be applied to the sale of a different item.

settings.tbb_q: How do I sign-up for two blind brother email communication?
settings.tbb_a: To hear about our new arrivals, special offers and exclusive events first, you can subscribe to our email list at the bottom of our homepage.

settings.tbb_q: Where can I find sizing information?
settings.tbb_a:
Size information is can be found on each product page under "Size Guide".

The graphic tee line size chart measurements are measured from left armpit to right armpit. To get the full chest measurement you'll want to double what is listed. For our other items, such as the men's and women's henleys and hoodies, the measurements are listed as full circumferences so there's no need to double the value to get the accurate sizing guidelines.

settings.tbb_q: Can I use copies of the pictures on your website for my own use?
settings.tbb_a: Credit must be given to Two Blind Brothers to use our pictures for your own use.

settings.tbb_q: How can I find answers to any additional questions I may have?
settings.tbb_a: Please email us at hello@twoblindbrothers.com or call us at (917) 722-6284.

settings.tbb_q: Why don't you offer plus, or big and tall sizes?
settings.tbb_a: It is absolutely not our intention to be exclusive in any way, or to deter anyone from enjoying our products. As of right now, we offer expanded sizes in both our men's and women's styles in our 'Graphic' product line. We hope to offer a wider range of sizes in the future as we continue to grow as a company and brand.  We apologize for any inconveniences associated with our current available sizes, and look forward to expanding our offerings in the future.

settings.tbb_q: Do you plan on offering a children's line in the future?
settings.tbb_a: Yes, we are definitely interested in creating a super soft children's line. We've gotten a lot of feedback from other parents who are interested in a children's line -- especially with sensory sensitivities in mind-- and would love to work on this. That being said, we are a super small company so it takes some time to implement new products. Please feel free to subscribe to receive updates through our Facebook page -- all new product information will be posted here, as well as new projects and events.

settings.tbb_q: What does the braille tank say?
settings.tbb_a: Our tank says: “If you can see this you probably can't read this. Feel the difference. Two Blind Brothers.”

settings.tbb_q: What are the lengths of the Love is Blind bracelet and necklace?
settings.tbb_a: The bracelet measures 7.5 inches in length, and the necklace is 17 inches.

settings.title: Take 15% off your first order
settings.body: You will receive a code to use at checkout

settings.title: WILL YOU SHOP BLIND?
settings.desc:
Welcome to the Shop Blind Monthly Challenge! It's simple. Would you buy something that you can't see? For only $39 a month, you'll receive a special package of items and become part of our mission! Trust us! 100% of the profits are donated to Foundation Fighting Blindness to help find a cure for blindness. If you don't love it - you can exchange or return your items 
 -- no questions asked.

settings.button_title: What shop blind means to us

settings.hero_subtitle: The Best in Sun Protection and a Replacement Program that will Keep you Covered

settings.feature_copy: Polycarbonate (a.k.a. the stuff used in astronauts‚Äô visors) is less likely to scratch or fracture than plastic.
Shades that absorb 100% of both UVA and UVB rays, which means protection against retina damage and vision loss.
Our polarized lenses protect from all forms of harmful light including unwanted glare from water, windshields, and other reflective surfaces.
Anti-reflective treatment provides all-over sun glare reduction ‚Äì even from behind!
Frames are made from nylon-based propionate, making them lighter (and more comfy) than your average shades.
The classic frame style comes in two colors that flatter every face shape, skin tone, and gender.

settings.hero_subcopy: Classic style, the best in sun protection, and they‚Äôre made in collaboration with a visually impaired production team.

settings.warranty_text: Sunglasses can help protect your eyes from UV rays, but not all pairs are created equal. In fact, wearing unpolarized shades can cause more damage than wearing nothing at all.
That‚Äôs why we made the Cavaliers ‚Äì featuring break- and scratch-resistant, double-sided polarized lenses that absorb 100% of UVA and UVB rays, plus an easy replacement policy...
...because sunglasses are the 4th most commonly lost item by adults. We don‚Äôt think you should have to choose between awesome sun protection or a cheap pair of subpar sunglasses.

settings.claims_title:
We take eye health seriously.
You Should Too.
settings.claims_copy: It‚Äôs a fact: whether you have 20/20 vision or Stargardt's Disease like us, sun exposure causes retinal damage and vision loss over time.
settings.claims_subcopy: Never choose between eye health and saving money on sunglasses again.

settings.title: Accidents happen. We've got you covered!
settings.body:
It’s simple: When you buy a pair of Cavaliers with our Protection Program, you’ll have access to replacements at a fraction of the cost. There are no questions, forms, or hassle.

If you need more details, check them out here.

settings.health_text: Even on cloudy days, the sun‚Äôs UVA and UVB rays can cause damage. UVA damages the retina at the back of your eye while UVB can cause degradation to the cornea and lens at the front of your eye.

Without polarized lenses, you‚Äôre better off wearing nothing. Cheap shades simulate darkness without filtering UVA or UVB rays, letting pupils dilate to let in more light ‚Äì causing more damage to your eyes.
Our Cavaliers‚Äô polarized lenses filter 100% of UVA + UVB rays, eliminate glare, and reduce eye strain, all which can help slow vision loss ‚Äì even for people already experiencing it.

settings.claims_copy: Did you know: the more you expose your eyes to UV rays, the higher your risk of vision loss and damage to the cornea, retina, and lens?

settings.production_copy: We could have made our sunglasses almost anywhere, but we wanted to collaborate with a team that gets it. Each pair is finished by a visually impaired team in the USA. They‚Äôre an integral part of our production process who understand the importance of eye health better than anyone. And that means your Two Blind Brothers Cavalier purchase is doing twice the good ‚Äì funding research to cure blindness AND providing great jobs for the visually impaired.

settings.translation: Learn + decode the full braille alphabet A-Z !
If you can read this you probably can't read this. Feel the difference. Two Blind Brothers
Queens, Staten Island, Manhattan, Brooklyn and The Bronx
Thanks to you, we are one step closer to a cure

settings.x_pre_title: Music To Our Eyes Presented by Foundation Fighting Blindness
settings.x_amb_title: GET PUMPED FOR THE LIVESTREAM EVENT BY WATCHING X AMBASSADOR‚ÄôS ‚ÄúRENEGADES‚Äù VIDEO

settings.title: What is Shop Blind?
settings.answer: The premise of Shop Blind is ‚Äútrust‚Äù ‚Äì we‚Äôre asking you to trust us to get a product we think you will LOVE without ever having seen it, the same way that trust lifts us all up everyday. When we can't see something, we trust the people around us, and nearly always, we find that people love to help each other. To do this, we‚Äôve temporarily adjusted our website so that you won‚Äôt be able to see any of the items we normally sell; all you‚Äôll be able to see is discounted price points. If you are worried about what you are going to get, we can make you two promises - #1 You'll love what you get. Trust us :) Hint: These are our best and newest items. (They aren't size dependent). And, #2 You'll be helping to cure blindness because 100% of all profits go to pre-clinical researchers for eye disease. Finally, if you don't like what you get, you can always return it, no questions asked.

settings.title: Who are you guys?
settings.answer: We‚Äôre Bryan and Bradford Manning, the founders of Two Blind Brothers. At a young age, we were both diagnosed with Stargardt disease, which is a form of macular degeneration. Our experience has inspired us to help others who are visually impaired, which is why we started Two Blind Brothers. Through our company, we offer clothing that looks and feels amazing, while supporting research and therapies that may one day cure blindness.

settings.title: Where do the profits go?
settings.answer: 100% of profits are donated to the Foundation for Fighting Blindness and other important organizations that are researching retinal eye disease.

settings.title: Why should I trust you?
settings.answer: Every single day, we put our trust into the hands of complete strangers to help us navigate through the world, whether it‚Äôs ordering food off a menu, safely getting to where we need to go, filling out forms, or buying clothing. We are "paying it forward" to all the strangers who have helped us along the way by asking you to trust us this time. Will you take the leap?

settings.title: What will I get?
settings.answer: We can only tell you that the items selected at each price point are wonderful. They are easily gift-able. They are gifts that you'd expect during the holiday. You also will be paying much less than if you ordered them on our regular website. If you aren't happy, you can return it for a full refund.

settings.title: How do I know if my item will fit?
settings.answer: We solved this, and we just ask you to trust us. There is a small chance that what you receive won't be ideal, and if this happens, feel free to return it.

settings.title: What happens once I check out?
settings.answer: You will receive an order confirmation in your email. After that, all that‚Äôs left is to wait for your order to be shipped to your door!

settings.title: When will my order ship?
settings.answer:
Your order will ship within 1 - 3 days of being placed.

*Please note there may be a warehouse delay due to COVID-19

settings.title: Can I modify or cancel my order?
settings.answer: If you need to modify or cancel your order, please contact hello@twoblindbrothers.com.

settings.title: Can I return or exchange my Shop Blind item?
settings.answer: Important: If you are returning your Shop Blind order and there were multiple items in it, you received a "bundle", and our system requires that you return all of them. There is no way for us to accept a single item from a bundle. For example, if you received a scarf and a winter hat or a pack of socks, we need all items returned because they are actually considered a single purchase in our system. We will send you a new single item and we cover all shipping if that's what you wanted. We do offer free returns and exchanges. You can return your online order by requesting a return label via this link or by emailing us at hello@twoblindbrothers.com The order can be returned for a full refund within 45 days of purchase. Orders can be exchanged within 45 days of purchase if it has not been worn and is in good condition. For international returns, you are responsible for return shipping.

settings.title: Can I return a gift card?
settings.answer: Yes. Please email us the code that is printed on the gift card so we can deactivate it.

settings.title: How do I generate a return?
settings.answer:
- Start your return process and print your label here
Remember to include the customer order number and billing name in the request.
- A return label will be emailed to you. Shipping will be paid for.
Drop your return package at an authorized location. You can find your nearest location at ups.com or usps.com.
- If your order is a return, you will be refunded after the returned item has been received by us.
- If your order is an exchange, your exchange will be sent out once the exchanged item has been received by us.
- Please include in the notes the item you are returning as well as the item you would like to receive in exchange (if it is an exchange).

settings.content_bottom: Due to the current situation with COVID-19, orders¬†may be slightly delayed due to our team taking extra precautions, but know we are working diligently to get your order out to you!

settings.name: Lisa M

settings.name: Karen K

settings.name: Amber G

She got socks & a hat, & LOVED them. She loves the¬†fact that I shopped blind, & that all profits go back to the charity. She is a music therapist, & works¬†with homeless youth, so things like this are right up her alley. She said the socks are super soft. Thank¬†you again, & I hope you have continued success! I will be ordering again.¬†

settings.name: Debbie J

Thank you so much. This was a fun surprise!

settings.name: Julie R

settings.name: Joe B

It‚Äôs about what you, Bradford and Bryan are doing and what you stand for. My¬†investment is a small way of saying I support you guys! Hope you had a great Thanksgiving!

settings.name: Marcy D
settings.title: Just what I needed
settings.review: I ordered, it came just in time for the snow! A beautiful black scarf and 4 pair of heavy socks! How did¬†you know it was just what I needed! Thank you so much Bryan and Bradford!

settings.name: Elizabeth O
settings.title: Thank you!
settings.review: I sent my blind box to my BFF and her daughter and they both loved all the cozy items inside. Thank¬†you for doing this crucial work and making it fun along the way. Best to you all.

settings.name: Debbie R
settings.title: Wonderful
settings.review: About two weeks ago I saw an ad for TBB. Their challenge is to order an item, pay fo Ritchies, but have no idea what you are¬†receiving. I took the challenge. All I entered in was female and my shirt size‚Ä¶knowing that I may not receive a shirt. ¬†I received my¬†items today and wow‚Ä¶I did not expect such a soft shirt or sock. I‚Äôm so thankful and excited to find out what the braille says. Thank¬†you TBB! What a great way to build awareness and help find a cure! I will keep you all in my prayers!

settings.name: Noelle L
settings.title: Thank you Two Blind Brothers!
settings.review: Received my first package today, and I LOVE IT! Cannot wait to wear my new shirt this weekend. ¬†Thank you, Two Blind Brothers!

settings.name: Vicki T
settings.title: Support TBB
settings.review: Love ‚ÄúTwo Blind Brothers‚Äù. I spent $90 to blindly order a shirt for my husband. I spent that much because I wanted a nice shirt, but in¬†¬†addition to that I wanted to support these brothers. ¬†This shirt is absolutely beautiful and it also came with a free pair of socks. My¬†husband loves the feel of the fabric and so do I. I‚Äôm going to wear it when he‚Äôs not! Please support TBB. They‚Äôre on a great mission.

settings.name: Vikki C
settings.title: God bless you
settings.review: I have macular degeneration in my right eye, lost my central vision, been almost 4 years now, no cure, no correction. I go every 4 to¬†5 weeks to get a shot in my eye to keep fluids from building up in the gap. It‚Äôs a great thing you‚Äôre doing. God bless you.

settings.name: Mickie K
settings.title: Wish you the best
settings.review: Our son was born with one eye not formed and the second eye shaped as a small eye and only partially formed. He should not have¬†any sight at all. ¬†He can see straight ahead of him, but not to the sides of his eye. ¬†It is a miracle he has sight. lIfe has been tough on¬†him but he works full time and lives on his own. ¬†Wishing you the best for your business.¬†

settings.title: Why should I Shop Blind?
settings.answer:
We are Bradford and Bryan Manning. We started Two Blind Brothers to make the softest clothing and gifts in the world and to help the blind community by donating 100% of our profits back to research for eye disease through¬†Foundation Fighting Blindness. We also hire blind workers through organizations like Industries for the Blind to help make our items.

We have an eye condition called Stargardt's disease.

This video explains our story:¬†https://youtu.be/4z_0fpLsWgs

More about Shop Blind:¬†https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtsHxYoaxKBDl_kMQmtLPCw

settings.title: How does this help blindness?
settings.answer:
There are 3 important ways:

  1. 100% of the profits are donated to research through organizations like Foundation Fighting Blindness.¬†
  2. The items are made in part by organizations like Industries for the Blind in North Carolina that hire blind workers.
  3. You become part of our growing family. You prove that empowerment and inclusion of the blind community are important. You prove that what a company stands for is just as important as what it sells. You become someone who can share this experience with someone else. Because of you, we have the best community of customers that any project could ever dream of having.

settings.title: What will I receive?
settings.answer: There are no hints at all, but we can promise you that you'll LOVE what you get. If you don't, you can initiate your return no questions asked using this return link.

settings.title: What is the difference between price options?
settings.answer: If you are feeling bold, go for the higher price options. You will not regret it. We've made sure that the items included in this challenge are ridiculously awesome! They are specifically made for this challenge to reward "trust". Most people do the lowest price option and love it, but it gets better and better as you go up.

settings.title: Shipping Information
settings.answer:
Shipping rates & average timelines

  • Expedited Domestic (2-4 days) $16.99 USD
  • Standard Domestic (3-5 days) $6.99 USD
  • Standard Domestic for orders $95 and up (3-5 days) Free
  • International Shipping - Canada (6-8 days) $16.95 USD *Duties may apply

Free shipping¬†does not apply¬†to expedited shipping orders. Free shipping¬†does not apply¬†to international orders.

***During times of increased shipping volume, orders may take longer to arrive at their destination, some take up to two weeks currently depending on the shipping provider.***

Shipping Fees

Shipping fees are non-refundable. If you refuse any shipments from¬†twoblindbrothers.com, you will be held responsible for the original shipping charges, plus the cost of returning the package to us. The amount will be deducted from any credit issued.

For domestic returns, we offer prepaid return shipping labels.

Currently, we do not offer prepaid return shipping labels for international returns.

Processing time

All orders are subject to a processing time (1-2 days on average) that is separate from the time it takes for a shipment to reach its destination. All orders are fulfilled and shipped from our warehouses Monday through Friday during hours of operation.

settings.title: What is the value of the items in my Shop Blind package?
settings.answer:
First, we would like to thank you for trusting us by taking part in our Shop Blind Challenge. We want you to know that you have truly received high quality items that meet the value of the cost you have paid. In addition, you are contributing to finding a cure for blindness as well as supporting visually impaired workers. We truly appreciate you being part of this mission with us. If you are truly unhappy with your experience, we have a 100% Happiness Guarantee. We accept returns and/or exchanges within 45 days of purchase. For US customers, we offer a prepaid return label.

  • If you need any assistance or have any questions, feel free to reach out to our incredible customer service team at¬†hello@twoblindbrothers.com
  • *Shop Blind customers who receive the Cavalier Sunglasses in their package: Your sunglasses automatically come with our incredible warranty program. This allows you up to 4 replacement pairs a year if you lose or damage your sunglasses.

settings.icon_description: Ultra-soft designer clothing from natural fibers for the purpose of curing blindness
Made in California, our premium blend is buttery soft, and incredibly durable.
Premium Cotton and Polyester blends for the softest feel that you‚Äôll never want to take off.

settings.title: Scratch And Crack Resistant Lenses
settings.content: Polycarbonate (a.k.a. the stuff used in astronauts‚Äô visors) is less likely to scratch or fracture than plastic.

settings.title: 100% UV Protection
settings.content: Shades that absorb 100% of both UVA and UVB rays, which means protection against retina damage and vision loss.

settings.title: Glare Reduction
settings.content: Our polarized lenses protect from all forms of harmful light including unwanted glare from water, windshields, and other reflective surfaces.
Sunglasses can help protect your eyes from UV rays, but not all pairs are created equal. In fact, wearing unpolarized shades can cause more damage than wearing nothing at all.
That‚Äôs why we made the Cavaliers ‚Äì featuring break- and scratch-resistant, double-sided polarized lenses that absorb 100% of UVA and UVB rays, plus an easy replacement policy...
...because sunglasses are the 4th most commonly lost item by adults. We don‚Äôt think you should have to choose between awesome sun protection or a cheap pair of subpar sunglasses.

settings.heading: We Take Eye Health Seriously.
settings.content: It‚Äôs a fact: whether you have 20/20 vision or Stargardt's Disease like us, sun exposure causes retinal damage and vision loss over time.

settings.title: UV? NO THANKS.
settings.content: Even on cloudy days, the sun‚Äôs UVA and UVB rays can cause damage. UVA damages the retina at the back of your eye while UVB can cause degradation to the cornea and lens at the front of your eye.

settings.title: GET POLARIZED
settings.content: Without polarized lenses, you‚Äôre better off wearing nothing. Cheap shades simulate darkness without filtering UVA or UVB rays, letting pupils dilate to let in more light ‚Äì causing more damage to your eyes.

settings.title: 100% PROTECTION
settings.content: Our Cavaliers‚Äô polarized lenses filter 100% of UVA + UVB rays, eliminate glare, and reduce eye strain, all which can help slow vision loss ‚Äì even for people already experiencing it.

settings.title: SUN 101
settings.content: Did you know: the more you expose your eyes to UV rays, the higher your risk of vision loss and damage to the cornea, retina, and lens?
